name: Waterfalls
description: Enjoyed the waterfalls & scenery,but otherwise average movie. If you're a fan of the lead actors too,may find it watchable.

name: Foods
description: A typical Chinese meal will have two things - a carbohydrate or starch like noodles, rice or buns, and accompanying stir fries or dishes of veggies, fish and meat.

name: Culture
description: Two major religions influence Japanese traditions and culture: Shintoism and Buddhism.
